Algorithms

Class AutoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.AutoPlayer

  • public class AutoPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    this class represents all the obstacles vertices and fruits as Node elements, the class can generate a path from the player's location to the games fruits without points lost by Obstacles in the process. the classes fields are an obstacles list, fruits list, vertices list containing all the fruits and obstacles and the currant location of the player.
    Author:
    318696150
